1.content:
You are responsible for knowing the rules! Please be sure you have read and understand them before you add anything.


Rules

Princesses from media do not need to be their canon age.
No mpreg. Sorry folks.
No sex for characters under the age of 18.
Let's not kill people please.
Unless it is a choice chapter please give at least a few sentences.
Proper grammar and punctuation, or at least an attempt at it, is required. I reserve the right to delete or edit chapters to make them more easily readable.
Rapid pregnancy is allowed but let's keep things sensible. (No getting pregnant with hundred of babies at nine months in five seconds...)
Let's also keep the baby number in general sensible. Dozens of 20 pound children or whatever? No please.
Other things may be in the womb like eggs and such but it must be in relation to pregnancy and not in the stomach.
Please no describing an under 18's breasts in a sexual way. If you want to say that they have grown them or are producing milk now that's fine but please no lengthy or detailed descriptions.
Unbirth is allowed but only over 18.
Birth is allowed but please do not be detailed about child emergence under 18.
You may reserve one of the routes on a chapter that you have added by adding a (R) to the end of the choice (I will remove this when you have added the chapter.). The reservation is valid for one month. It will be removed if not added to by that time.
If you are going to add a new character or start a new plotline, you must give at least two chapters of that story. This is to prevent endless character choices without any story attached to them.
1.title: Ground Rules

choices: Princess from something other than a movie
11.content: What category is your Disney princess in?
11.title: Disney Princesses

1111.content: Will Snow White be her canon age in the Disney film? Older? Or younger?
1111.title: Snow White

11112.content: The age of the Grimm brothers version then? Or slightly different?
11112.title: Younger

111122.content:
Very well.

What will Snow White be pregnant with?

choices: Snow White collapses in a sleep
Snow White goes through a regularly paced pregnancy
Snow White experiences a rapid pregnancy
1111221.content:
Snow White had taken easily to life with the dwarves. Even at her young age and a place upbringing, she was an excellent housekeeper and did all that she could to help out. When the queen in the disguise came with an apple as a gift, her trusting nature thought nothing of it.

“Oh thank you!” The girl chirped happily, taking the perfect looking fruit and sinking her teeth into it. Little did she know that the queen had hatched a dastardly plan with this sweet fruit, a potion sunk into it that would impregnate the little princess and leave the queen fairest of all. The moment the skin of the fruit had touched Snow White’s lips the potion was already at work, flowing through her body to impregnate her.
1111221.title: Human child

choices: The dwarves find out about the change
The evil queen brings another apple
11112213.content:
Snow White saw the disguised queen off once she had finished her apple, smiling brightly and thanking her once again. She returned to her work afterwards, happy to be of use in this home while the dwarves sheltered her.

It was a few days later that the changes started. Her dress was beginning to feel tight. The chest was pressing down on her developing breasts and the middle felt all too uncomfortable, but she soldiered on.

By the fourth morning after her apple treat, her dress would not close at all. Snow White blushes and laid the gown on her bed in the small room the dwarves let her have and looked herself over in the mirror. Her hands cupped her small breasts through her shift.

“I must be becoming a woman.” She whispered, despite the fact that the dwarves were already off to the mines for the day. “But...” her hands slid down to her stomach for a moment before she rucked up her shift to reveal the five month pregnant swell underneath. “I do not recall other girls bellies growing.” Untaught on the birds and the bees, the princess had no idea what was happening to her or that she would be a mother. Her hand stroked over the firm swell curiously. Well, if the dress no longer fit, there was nothing to be done. She would have to alter it that evening. For the moment, she set about the chores in her shift and bloomers.
11112213.title: Snow White experiences a rapid pregnancy

choices: She shows the dwarves what she made when they return home.
She takes a short walk on the woods
111122131.content:
Snow White kept herself hidden from the eyes of the dwarves after that, leaving supper on the table just before they were due home before shutting herself away in her room. This was a woman’s trouble, after all. No need to bother anyone else with it.

She set to work loosening up the bodice of her dress so that it would fit her more properly in the morning before settling into bed and easily dozing off. All would be well when she woke.


But it wasn’t.


The next morning found Snow White standing before the mirror again as her now 28 week pregnant belly pulled the fabric of her shift tight. The girl rolled it up again to feel the fertile mound of her stomach curiously taking in the sight of herself. She could feel that there was something heavy within her, the weight causing her back to bow and her stance to slightly widen. Her breasts were even fuller now and heavier than they had been before.

Snow White tried to think nothing of it and shoved her shift down again before going about her chores, though she could feel the tasks growing harder to do. By the end of the day she was worn out and all but collapsed into bed, out like a light before the dwarves even returned.

The sixth day after eating the apple, she awoke to her shift already bunched up above her stomach, pushed there by her growing stomach. The young princess waddled her way to the mirror to be met with the sight of her 35 week pregnant form, the weight now settled heavy in her widened hips.

“Oh my...” she breathed. There would be no making her old dress fit now, even after all her alterations. The girl finished her chores as quickly as she could before settling in her room and working up a new dress from the window curtains.

It was two pieces, a skirt that was fitted to her wider hips and fell much like her old one had, and a new top that held her milky busom while the fabric below flowed loose, the front cut open in order to set her belly free as she was unsure how much larger she would get.
111122131.title: She continues to grow

1113.content:
Which princess?

Note: While Alice is not technically a princess, she was dubbed one of the "princesses of heart" in Kingdom Hearts so she will be included here for variety.
1113.title: Other

11233.content:
Which princess?

Note: While Mulan is technically not a princess, she is considered part of the Disney princess line. She has been added here for variety.
11233.title: Other

1133.content:
Which Princess?

Note: Elsa is technically a queen but has been added for variety.
1133.title: other

1133333.content:
Which princess?

Note: Vanellope was added onto here instead of the previous chapter in case a princess has been missed and needs to be added later as an edit.
1133333.title: other

15.content:
This is where you can make a princess of your own who will be pregnant.

Please be sure to leave an opening for others to add after you have selected yours though. :)

How old is your princess?
15.title: Your own original princess

151.content:
Let's take a look at our princesses:

-Emma,12 years old:
A very spoiled kid, who want's to have everything and hates when someone has more things than she has.

-Chloe,14 years old:
She is what you call ' a hyperactive kid '.
She must be everywhere,see everything and touch everything.

So who you want to choose:Emma or Chloe?

info.brief_description: The belly of a princess swells up with children
